subject: ADS Tech Instant FM device & manual sweep
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi All.  Just a quick note to say I'm getting communication via a manual sweep of the ADS 
Tech Instant FM hardware and Snaptune One software combo.  There is also Instant Radio 
software included, but so far I can only figure out how to make it emulate an automated 
sweep and I can't make it go fast enough to be useful.  

Just thought I'd share this info as another viable sweep tool for communication.  I'm playing 
the sound through the speaker of my PC and recording via the built-in mic of my Mac using 
Audacity.  

Cost of the unit, including shipping, is about $25 through BestBuy.com  Wish it had an AM 
option!

Here is a link to the mfr site:

http://www.adstech.com/products/RDX-155-EF/intro/RDX-155-EF_intro.asp?pid=RDX-
155-EF

Margaret
